alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:12PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Denver and western Adams Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Commerce City, or 6 miles northeast of Denver, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Denver, northern Aurora, southern Thornton, Commerce City, Brighton, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses and Barr Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
